sentence.Network_en: Lovelock eased back the throttles and the ship steadied.
sentence.Network_cn: 洛夫洛克慢慢地拉杆减速，船稳了下来。

sentence.Network_en: Lovelock'sprincipled nonconformity can be traced to his childhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 洛夫洛克自成一套的特立独行可以追溯到他的童年时期。

auth_sentence.content: The lovelock phenomenon came to Paris five years ago.
auth_sentence.res_content: The lovelock phenomenon came to Paris five years ago.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The lovelock phenomenon came to Paris five years ago.

auth_sentence.content: James Lovelock the author of the Gaia books is also one of my heroes.
auth_sentence.res_content: James Lovelock the author of the Gaia books is also one of my heroes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: James Lovelock the author of the Gaia books is also one of my heroes.

auth_sentence.content: But if we over report the Lovelock view we will be accused of fostering alarmism and despair.
